request.description: Permanently delete a contact and all associated content to follow GDPR. Use optional property 'idProperty' set to 'email' to identify contact by email address. request.description: Perform a partial update of an Object identified by `{objectId}`. `{objectId}` refers to the internal object ID by default, or optionally any unique property value as specified by the `idProperty` query param. Provided property values will be overwritten. Read-only and non-existent properties will be ignored. Properties values can be cleared by passing an empty string.

request.description: Batch read associations for objects to specific object type. The 'after' field in a returned paging object  can be added alongside the 'id' to retrieve the next page of associations from that objectId. The 'link' field is deprecated and should be ignored. Note: The 'paging' field will only be present if there are more pages and absent otherwise.
